title: Thugz BlockChain Plugin
description: This plugin allow you to interact with BlockChains inside Unreal Engine. All C++ code is exposed on BluePrint
longDescription:
Important note: If you experience this issue when packaging: "expecting to find a type to be declared in a module rules named 'thugzbcfor53' in marketplacerules, version=0.0.0.0, culture=neutral, publickeytoken=null. this type must derive from the 'modulerules' type defined by unreal build tool." when building for iOS, try to copy/paste the plugin directory from "C:\Program Files\Epic Games\UE_5.3\Engine\Plugins\Marketplace" to "Yourproject\Plugins".

This should solve the issue


UPDATE 07/10/2024:

  • iOS compatiblity for build


UPDATE 25/09/2024:

  • Addition of retrieving NFTs held by a Solana wallet using the Moralis API
  • Addition of retrieving NFT metadata using the Moralis API


UPDATE 10/09/2024: We have corrected the bug for the 5.4 version so you can now use it with this version of UE.


UPDATE 16/08/2024:

  • SOLANA Wallet creation
  • SOLANA Wallet import with private keys


UPDATE 10/07/2024:

  • Retrieving NFT pictures with HelloMoon API for Solana and with Moralis API for Ethereum.
  • Upgrade to version 5.4
  • Update for Android (tested)


UPDATE 08/02/2024 :

Interaction with EVM BlockChain is live! we have tested eth and polygon BC with Moralis API. Other EVM BC should works but have not been tested. Besides, we can now show your SOL Balance both with HelloMoon API and Moralis API.


NEXT UPDATE PLANNED:

  • iOS compatibility

SOLANA:

  • Import Wallet using Phantom
  • Transaction management (sending token)


Thugz BlockChain Plugin enables games to interact easily with common Web3 smart contract standards. Game developers will be able to let end-users log in with their crypto wallets, using their Public Key, and retrieve the NFT data to use it in their game. They will also be able to create SOLANA Wallet inside their game or retrieve their wallet using their private key.


End-users may then access BlockChain as part of their in-game interactions. For example, end-users can retrieve their NFT token balances, Metadata NFT and use them to do token gated or other features using NFT data. They will also be able to create Solana Wallet without using extension or other complex softs.


  • For reading data, both Solana and EVM BlockChain technologies are supported using the HelloMoon API and the Moralis API. To use the plugin, you need to request an API key here for HelloMoon: https://www.hellomoon.io/developers and here for Moralis: https://moralis.io/.

It's free !


  • For wallet creation and import, only Solana is currently supported. Nothing more than our plugin is needed to perform those actions.


All documentation is available here: https://www.thugz-labs.com/ThugsLabsDocumentation.html


You can contribute to the project here: https://github.com/ThugzLabs/


If you have specific needs, don't hesitate to contact us in our discord: https://discord.gg/thugz-life-889994637215932416


Follow us on X: https://twitter.com/Thugz_NFT and https://twitter.com/War_Thugz
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • SOLANA Wallet creation
  • SOLANA Wallet Import with private key

For EVM and SOLANA:

  • Get image of the NFT
  • Get token nft Mint
  •  Get token owner account
  •  Get token metadata adress
  • Get token metadata Name
  • Get token metadata Symbol
  • Get token metadata URI
  • Get token Seller fees
  • Get token creator data
  • Get Token JSON


Code Modules:

  • Runtime 


Number of Blueprints: 17

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Network Replicated: N/A

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: TESTED: Win64, Android. ISSUE DETECTED : iOS and CURRENTLY NOT TESTED: MAC, LINUX

Documentation:

  • https://www.thugz-labs.com/ThugsLabsDocumentation.html

Important/Additional Notes: If you need support, join us on: https://discord.gg/thugz-life-889994637215932416
